name: Matt Hoover
bio: I use Bash daily at work and home, and I think it is a foundational skill for mastering any UNIX-like system.

name: Steven Atkinson
bio: If you're not using bash...why not?! Learning bash is one of the best things you can do. It can help automate tasks and make your life a lot easier.

name: Michael Dimmitt
